description:
Ayumu is a high school boy who was killed by a serial killer and resurrected as a zombie by the necromancer, Eucliwood Hellscythe.
As a zombie, he is invincible and can exceed the limits of the human body. However, he still feels pain and will dry out in sunlight. There are various aspects of his zombie nature that Ayumu has yet to discover, such as the ability to absorb magic.
name: Aikawa Ayumu
